comments.body: You changed the error message here from `=/=` to `/=` which broke the doctests that assert on the expected output.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +32,36 @@assertNotEq x y
  | x /= y = return ()
  | otherwise = abort ("Failure, expected " <> show x <> " /= " <> show y)

-- | Infix version of `assertNotEq`.
